}W0zLL-ysoUBDXm%I#sE.text: Add costumes in the costumes tab! If your character is animated, connect these two blocks of code. Make sure that:- The first animated costume is called "1".- The costume for when the enemy is attacked is called "hit".- The hit costume is the last costume in the list.Change the repeat number to the total amount of costumes minus 2 (so as not to include costumes "1" and "hit" in the animated frames.

0j86JzaDKf`6{cF/VL,R.text: Once you import your enemy sprite, you will need to calibrate its position. To do that, run this custom block.Now, please go to the HealthBar sprite next.
